rules_text: [i]Stalwart[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, if that spell is targeting only a single Ally you control, copy it for each other Ally creature you control. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures. Otherwise, copy that spell once and you may choose new targets for the copy. If a spell copied this way is a permanent spell, the copies gain “At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent.”
